deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 11 hrs 49 mins
features: The Cosco Finale DX 2 in 1 Combination Booster Car Seat features a 5 point safety harness that converts to a belt positioning booster seat as your child grows, IIHS Best Bet rating for use in booster mode

With extended use in both of its 2 modes, this car seat accommodates children from 30 to 65 pounds forward facing with a harness, and as a belt positioning booster for toddlers and older kids 40 to 100 pounds
Perfect for growing families and carpools, this lightweight seat is easy to move from car to car; 3 of these car seats are designed to fit side by side across the back seat of most vehicles

An included removable and dishwasher safe cup holder on the side of this car seat allows your child to easily reach for their favorite drink or snack. Remove all dirt, mud and other debris using a damp cloth
Remove the easy to clean booster car seat pad and toss it into the washing machine and then your dryer for stress free cleaning
This booster car seat meets or exceeds federal, ASTM, and JPMA safety standards and includes a 1 year limited warranty

For more than 70 years, Cosco has been a leading children’s products brand recognized for its dedication to safety and value; From bouncers to car seats, swings to strollers, and high chairs to play yards, Cosco's essential baby products feature solid value and smart design
NOTE: Kindly refer the User Manual which is available below for guidance
body.description: The Cosco Finale DX 2-in-1 Combination Booster Car Seat may be the last car seat you will ever need. This high-back 2-in-1 car seat features a 5-point safety harness that converts to a belt-positioning booster seat as your child grows. With extended use in both of its 2 modes, this car seat accommodates children from 30 to 65 pounds forward-facing with a harness, and as a belt-positioning booster for toddlers and older kids 40 to 100 pounds. Perfect for growing families and carpools, this lightweight seat is easy to move from car to car. 3 of these car seats are designed to fit side-by-side across the back seat of most vehicles. An included removable and dishwasher-safe cup holder on the side of this car seat allows your child to easily reach for their favorite drink or snack. Remove the easy-to-clean booster car seat pad and toss it into the washing machine and then your dryer for stress-free cleaning. This booster car seat meets or exceeds federal, ASTM, and JPMA safety standards and includes a 1-year limited warranty. For more than 70 years, Cosco has been a leading children’s products brand recognized for its dedication to safety and value. From bouncers to car seats, swings to strollers, and high chairs to play yards, Cosco's essential baby products feature solid value and smart design. Do not use the harness system when using as a booster seat.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us We keep the village in motion with awesome, essential gear for your kiddos designed with simplicity, affordability, and value in mind.CoscoKids is the trusted brand for every family who sees themselves in us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very lightweight, perfect travel seat!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this carseat specifically to be our seat for traveling and we also use it as a back-up seat in if we have a guest who needs a seat. I was super impressed at how lightweight it is! We also purchased (separately) a travel car seat bag that you can wear as a backpack and just slip this seat in and wear it while walking through the airport. It’s easy to transport and sturdy, and then super easy to install into any car or even the smallest of rentals or Ubers and it doesn’t take up much space so you can also still fit 2 adults in the backseat of most standard vehicles plus this car seat.Wouldn’t necessarily recommend this seat to be your primary seat for everyday use at home or for a long road trip in your own vehicle due to it may not be the most comfortable seat (I.e. the seat back is very straight and it doesn’t recline or anything fancy) BUT for taking along with you while traveling by air and then using it at your destination, you really can’t beat this one! Plus the price is nice so if it gets broken or lost by the airline, it’s not a huge loss. I recommend gate checking it though, less chance of it getting lost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight, great for airplanes
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for a cross-country holiday trip by airplane. Our toddler (26 months) sat on this in his airplane seat - great for flights. Very light weight, fits through the Xray machine, slim enough to fit on one airplane seat without crowing anyone else, and more comfortable for our kid than trying to sit him on a plane seat built for adults. The car seat boosts him up, so he can see out the airplane window and he could also reach the tray table for snacks & his iPad. I highly recommend buying a car seat bag on Amazon so you can easily carry the car seat through the airport. Very easy to install in your car with the LATCH anchors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These car seats worked great for us. We bought 2 for our kids when traveling to Europe. Unfortunately the car seats got lost on the flight there, but whatever happened to them before we got them back (I’m sure we’ve all heard horror stories of airport luggage handling…), the car seats came to us unscathed and in perfect condition! (Do yourself a favor and buy a car seat travel bag!)Once we finally were able to use them, the installation was very easy and straightforward (read the instruction manual once) and the kids were very comfortable in the seats, even on 4 hour long drives.These car seats are very light weight- we had 2 in the same travel bag and it was easy to carry them and maneuver them. These seats are now in our second car as back up travel seats.Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars First trip in 3 years!
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our 4 year old (45lbs) to travel internationally for the first time in 3 years and we didn't want to lug around his Graco....or risk it being damaged. We needed a seat in our rental anyway and we figured he would be more comfortable on the plane as this was his first time.Things I liked: super lightweight. At first I thought it would be flimsy but it was good! I have some issues walking around and was worried it would be heavy to lug around, but it was fine considering going through customs was a chore. It is rather bulky. The planes we were on were TINY but it fit in the seat just fine. Kiddo was happy in it! And it worked perfectly in the car/ cars. It was super easy to install....but......Things I didn't like: ....... getting the belts to get through the back of the seat on the plane? Tough and I have tiny hands. My entire arm got bruised but that's not the seats fault! Once it was in, it was FINE. It was a pain to lug it around and next time we would gate check it. Also, the straps got super tangled because it was being moved around and by the time we got to our last flight, I was over it.Overall: GREAT for traveling and on the plane. Fits even the tiny seats and my kiddo was super happy in it. Loved how it was portable and YES! IT IS FAA APPROVED. We only had 2 times we were asked so he prepared to show it (the seat is labeled clearly on the back). Is this our go too? Nope. Is it a great second seat for other people who are watching him? Absolutely!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great seat for small vehicle-2016 Ford focus
reviews.reviewText: I'm expecting my third baby in April and was having a lot of trouble finding car seats that would fit in the back. 2 of these and a baby trend infant carseat fit perfectly in my 2016 Ford Focus hatchback. They definitely are snug, but they are installed safely. The only thing that's a little annoying is the slot in the back where you feed the seatbelt through to install is small. I have small hands and I still have trouble .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Bang For Your Buck!
reviews.reviewText: We needed a "slim" car seat for our two kiddos. What we loved, the price, fit in our convertible and built in shoulder straps. Also when they grow past the.hihhest shoulder strap, then the cars seatbelt is introduced for longer use. One last thing, these things meet all safety standards AND are feather light. Moving car seats in and out of cars a few times a week makes all the difference when they are light in weight. Keep in mind the hook restraint system isn't as easy to attach/detach however most car seats still have them and aren't within the price range.Best bang for you buck!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love that it has the 5point safety harness and a ...
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this seat as a backup carseat for my grandmother's car. It's light enough for grandmother to move it around with ease if needed and sleek enough to not take up a massive amount of room in her already small backseat. I love that it has the 5point safety harness and a cup holder and that you can alternate on either side. The padding is thin and i do wish it was thicker but for the 10minutes a day she is in it, it suffices. I do not believe it would be comfortable for long distance. All in all i believe it is a good purchase for the price
Ligera, fácil de instalar, los broches de seguridad excelentes y no abarca mucho espacio en el asiento, es como si no llevara silla del carro
Muy resistente logra la función descrita
Muy buena calidad y muy segura
